business.headline: Wipro shares plunge nearly 5% despite rise in Q2 net profit. Here's whyAt around 9:30 am, Wipro was trading at Rs 242.12 on the NSE, down 4.6%. The Nifty IT index slipped around 1.2%, weighed down by losses in both Wipro and Infosys.

IMF chief says open trade key for India's continued economic riseIMF Director Kristalina Georgieva said that India stands out as one of the fastest-growing economies in the world and continues to make a major contribution to global growth because of its consistent reform efforts.

Canara HSBC Life listing today: What GMP hints about its debut on Dalal StreetThe IPO of Canara HSBC Life Insurance Company Limited was a book-built issue worth Rs 2,517.50 crore. It was entirely an offer-for-sale (OFS) of 23.75 crore shares.

Azoria CEO alleges ETF delisted after refusing to back firms hiring H-1B workersAzoria Capital's CEO alleges that his statement -- vowing not to invest in companies that replace American workers with H-1Bs -- led to a sudden move by the Board of Trustees of Tidal Trust III to delist the Azoria 500 Meritocracy ETF, a fund launched earlier this year.

Infosys Q2 profit rises 13% to Rs 7,364 crore; declares Rs 23 interim dividendInfosys revised the lower end of its full-year revenue guidance upward to 2–3%, compared with 1–3% earlier, reflecting cautious optimism amid a challenging global IT environment. The operating margin forecast for FY26 was retained at 20–22%.

Gold prices at all-time highs. What should buyers do this Dhanteras?With gold touching historic prices ahead of Dhanteras, shoppers are split between tradition and caution. The surge in rates has raised an important question—should you still buy now or wait?

Chasing the Gold rally this Dhanteras? Here's why you shouldn't go all inAs Dhanteras approaches, experts urge a cautious approach to gold investment, emphasizing its role as a hedge rather than a growth asset.

Group vs individual health insurance plan: 5 things you must knowGroup insurance seems convenient, but relying solely on it can be risky. Learn why individual health insurance offers continuity, flexibility, and tax advantages, ensuring your coverage remains intact regardless of employment.
Why income tax refunds have dropped 16% this yearAccording to official data from the Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT), income tax refunds dropped by about 16% between April and October 12.

entertainment.headline: Diesel review: promising premise lost in weak executionRelease Date:Fri Oct 17, 2025 Diesel movie review: Director Shanumugam Muthusamy 'Diesel', starring Harish Kalyan, Vinay Rai and Athulya Ravi, is a film that aims to tell the story of a fisher folk in the problems in the world of crude oil. The film lacks originality despite its length to mount the film on a huge canvas.

Britney Spears' ex claims she did cocaine while breastfeeding sons, singer hits back Kevin Federline's upcoming memoir alleges shocking incidents during his marriage to Britney Spears, including claims of drug use while breastfeeding. Spears has strongly denied these accusations and shared her journey towards healing and personal growth.

Ace Frehley, original KISS guitarist and rock icon, dies at 74 Ace Frehley, the original lead guitarist of the iconic rock band KISS, has died at 74. Renowned for his electrifying guitar solos and signature 'Spaceman' persona, Frehley helped define KISS's signature sound and larger-than-life stage presence, leaving behind a lasting legacy in rock music.

Rishab Shetty celebrates Kantara success with prayers at Chamundeshwari Temple Rishab Shetty visited the Chamundeshwari and Srikanteshwara Temples to express gratitude after 'Kantara: Chapter 1' blockbuster success. Calling the film's triumph a divine blessing, he plans to continue his spiritual journey with a visit to the Murudeshwari Temple in Bihar.

Blackpink's agency reacts to reports claiming December album launch Blackpink's agency, YG Entertainment, responded to several media reports that claimed the band's new album would be released in December or late 2025. The agency stated that comeback plans have not yet been decided.

Ahmedabad The Only Choice? Row Brews Over India's 2030 Commonwealth Games BidThis special report examines India's bid to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games, with Ahmedabad being recommended as the sole host city. The focus on a single city has led to questions of fairness, as the transcript highlights, 'focusing and concentrating almost every marquee event to a single city raises serious concerns about regional equity.' While Ahmedabad has proven its capabilities by hosting events like the 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup, other capable cities like Hyderabad, Delhi, and Bhubaneswar feel overlooked. Bhubaneswar, for instance, has successfully hosted the Hockey World Cup twice. The 2010 Commonwealth Games, despite controversies, significantly upgraded Delhi's infrastructure, reinforcing the argument for distributing major events. With India also aiming to bid for the 2036 Olympics, the debate over equitable development and giving multiple cities a fair chance to become sporting hubs is intensifying.

South Africa wary of Chamari Athapaththu threat in Sri Lanka clash: Nonkululeko MlabaSouth African spinner Nonkululeko Mlaba highlighted Chamari Athapaththu as a major threat ahead of their Women's World Cup clash with Sri Lanka, while emphasising that the Proteas will focus on their own game.
